meanings.definition: A system of Jewish mysticism and magic.
meanings.sent1: The rabbi shared ancient kabala teachings with his students.
meanings.sent2: She delved into the world of kabala to understand its mysteries.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to cast spells using kabala knowledge.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a realm of kabala, full of hidden wonders.
meanings.sent5: The book on kabala painted a vivid picture of mystical powers.

meanings.definition: A secret or esoteric doctrine or science.
meanings.sent1: The group whispered about the kabala of the ancient texts.
meanings.sent2: He was intrigued by the kabala of the old manuscripts.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to guard a hidden kabala in its mysterious eyes.
meanings.sent4: The kabala of the universe unfolded before his eyes.
meanings.sent5: The map revealed a kabala leading to a hidden treasure.
